messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: With Labour out of the race, the choice is between Sue Doughty and the Conservative candidate.

messages.title: Sue Doughty's contract with Guildford
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns, and stand up for our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sue is campaigning to protect the NHS here in Guildford from cuts to front line services.
Sue wants better investment in our schools to help cut class sizes and improve discipline.

mentions.candidate: Sue lives locally in Shalford and has a long record of action for us. As our local MP, Sue will put local people first and deliver real change and fairness for our area.
mentions.tacticalSituation: With Labour out of the race, the choice is between Sue Doughty and the Conservative candidate.

issues.education: Sue wants better investment in our schools to help cut class sizes and improve discipline.
issues.health: Sue is campaigning to protect the NHS here in Guildford from cuts to front line services.

endorsements.endorser: IndependentPoliticsHome largest representative UK poll, Autumn 2009
endorsements.endorsement: "Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour were by theirs"

quotes.text: "Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour were by theirs"
quotes.source: IndependentPoliticsHome largest representative UK poll, Autumn 2009

images.caption: Photos of Sue Doughty engaging with local community and children.
